Blacknightmare sat down and waited that Perseus said something


  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: Kraftlos 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sen=
t: Friday, November 30, 2007 5:42 AM
  Subject: Re: Atlantis - Picking Up T=
he Pieces


  When they reached next floor, Perseus lead Blacknightmare int=
o the conference room and motioned for her to sit down.



  On Nov 29, 200=
7 6:22 PM, Airshadow < airly2002@...> wrote:


    Blacknightmare:
=

    The femme walked slowly following Perseus



      ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
      From: Kraftlos 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Se=
nt: Wednesday, November 28, 2007 10:37 PM
      Subject: Re: Atlantis - Pic=
king Up The Pieces


      Perseus motioned to the trooper that had followe=
d him down there and the trooper came over to the cell and unlocked the doo=
r.

      "Let's go to somewhere more comfortable," he said to Blacknightma=
re, motioning for her to follow him. 



      On Nov 25, 2007 7:08 PM, Air=
shadow <airly2002@...> wrote:


        Blacknightmare:

        "T=
hen we should start" said the femme


          ----- Original Message ----=
- 
          From: Kraftlos 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        =
  Sent: Sunday, November 25, 2007 4:56 PM
          Subject: Atlantis - Pic=
king Up The Pieces


          Lord Perseus helped the militia put out the =
last of the fires while Ravenchief flew above the city taking pictures of t=
he damage.  No one could keep their mind of the battle which was going on j=
ust a few short miles away.

          Ravenchief glanced in the direction =
of the battle, but all he could see was the faint cloud of sweeps which sur=
rounded the island.  They felt horrible that Rodimus and the Matrix were at=
 stake, and there was nothing they could do. 

          "Perseus to all Ma=
ximals in Atlantis, I need to tend to our guest.  Please make yourselves us=
eful to the work crews, its going to be a long recovery." he said in a dist=
ant-sounding tone.

          Perseus approached the shield and glanced aro=
und the area for any enemies.  Salveo waited for the signal, then dropped t=
he shield.  The doors opened and Perseus stepped inside; Guardia took this =
opportunity to go out before the shield came back up.  A moment later the d=
efenses were back in place. 

          Perseus walked down the narrow corr=
idor ramps, leading the the lowest level of the base.  At the holding cells=
, he pushed a button on the panel next to battered blast doors and it slid =
open, revealing the completely trashed holding cell and security office.  H=
e continued to the dimly lit secondary cell and knocked on the bars. 

    =
      "Blacknightmare?  I apologize for making you wait so long.  We have s=
ome things we need to discuss." he said calmly.

          [TAG: Blacknight=
mare, Maximals in Atlantis]
